summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Bayview Street, from 13th Avenue South to 10th Avenue South, by constructing concrete sidewalk and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 14639 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
